CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances...10. The Beacon Furniture Store used two booths to display a luxurious modern sectional sofa and table, an air-conditioning unit and a Philco two-way door refrigerator. Robert Haas is shown demonstrating the two-way door refrigerator...-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Robert Haas standing in Beacon Furniture Store booth advertising Philco refrigerator and freezers, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
